select SumTripDistance, AvgTripDistance from sunnytest

select PassengerCount, SumTripDistance, AvgTripDistance from passengercountstats

SELECT 
    *
FROM

        FORMAT='CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATORâ€¯= ''
    )
with
(

[AvgTripDistance] float)
AS [r]
